sentence.Network_en: He is too opinionated to listen to anyone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太固执己见,听不进别人的意见.

sentence.Network_en: He is the most opinionated man I know.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是我所认识的最固执己见的人.

sentence.Network_en: One should never be presumptuous and opinionated.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... opine 想，以为 opinionated 固执己见的 opponent 对手，敌手.
Communist must never be opinionated domineering ., 共产党员决不可自以为是 , 盛气凌人.
Garfield　　加菲猫魅力无法挡 ... grouchy a. 脾气坏的；爱抱怨的 opinionated a. 固执己见的，武断的 lasagna n. 义大利千层面.
以o开头的英语英文单词 ... opine 想,以为 opinionated 固执已见的 opportune 合适的，适当的.

list.abs: 英语新闻常用词汇大全 - 豆丁网 ... on-the-spot broadcasting 现场直播 opinion poll 民意测验 overpass （人行）天桥.
是意见领袖(opinion leader),在新产品/品牌上市阶段,名人的引介或采用可以减轻游费者的疑虑,甚至鼓励购买,(7)名人通常是受到欢迎或.
专家意见（expert opinion），或称专家证词（expert testimony）、专家证据（expert evidence），顾名思义，即是指上述专家应当事 …
在探讨民意（public opinion）的文献中，对「民众」（public）一词之意涵有深入的解析与界定。最早的一个定义是将民众区分为一 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from the (rare) verb opinionate 'hold the opinion (that'), from opinion

entry.def: If you describe someone as opinionated, you mean that they have very strong opinions and refuse to accept that they may be wrong.

example.ex: Sue is the extrovert in the family; opinionated, talkative and passionate about politics.
example.tran: 苏是家中的外向行动派，性格固执，能说会道，而且对政治非常热衷。

example.ex: Your article is full of some of the most opinionated rubbish I have ever read.
example.tran: 你的文章充斥着我所读过的一些最为偏执的胡说八道。

auth_sentence.content: Because he is opinionated, he's made enemies.

auth_sentence.content: But other sites welcome photos and opinionated accounts.
